name: Llama's Revenge
description:
The Mountain Lion kingdom has attacked the capitol city of the Llamas. The Llamas managed to hold them off, and now the Lions have retreated back to their castle to lick their wounds. Now is the time for the Llamas to exact their revenge!

In Llama's Revenge, you play as the Llama Commander, moving between four lanes and sending different colored llamas to attack the Mountain Lions. Beware, the Mountain Lion King will send different colored mountain lions to take out the Commander. Choosing the correctly colored llama will defeat a mountain lion in it's lane. Choosing incorrectly will result in the defeat of your llama.
